item.title: Cldefence
item.dc:creator: @chesslemac chesslemac
item.description:
@chesslemac wrote:

so i need to change it where rune arrows need 1 def black dhide chaps and vambraces need 1 def and black dhide body need 40 all while having dragon stuff need 60 and rune armor needing 40 any ideas? oh heres my cldefence [code public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthan") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; } } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 141; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 120; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Infinity")) { return 25; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mystic")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dharoks")) { return 70; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Guthix")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Zamorak")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Saradomin")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Initiate")) { return 20; } if(ItemID == 7459) { return 20; } if(ItemID == 3751) { return 45; } if(ItemID == 3755) { return 20; } if(ItemID == 3749) { return 20; } if(ItemID == 6131) { return 40; } if(ItemID == 6129) { return 40; } if(ItemID == 6130) { return 40; } if(ItemID == 7457) { return 141; } if(ItemID == 7460) { return 40; } if(ItemID == 7461) { return 60; } if(ItemID == 7462) { return 70; } if(ItemID == 2503) { return 40; } if(ItemID == 7327) { return 1; } if(ItemID == 2643) { return 1; } if(ItemID == 2635) { return 1; } } return 1;
